sentences.en: A little caviar to begin with, madame?
sentences.cn: 先吃一点鱼子酱怎么样, 女士?

sentences.en: All right . We'll have some cheese wafers and caviar.
sentences.cn: 我们点一些干酪薄脆饼和鱼子酱.

sentences.en: And alleged sturgeon caviar was just cheap Mississippi paddlefish eggs.
sentences.cn: 而宣称是“鲟鱼鱼子酱”的鱼卵其实来自廉价的密西西比白鲟.

sentences.en: And I also want some caviar and hot paper.
sentences.cn: 请再给我拿一些鱼子酱和辣椒.

sentences.en: Around midnight the gar ? on arrives with beer and sandwiches – caviar sandwiches.
sentences.cn: 到了午夜前后,侍者送来了啤酒和三明治—鱼子酱三明治.

sentences.en: Caviar and oysters on ice are generally considered the ultimate luxury foods.
sentences.cn: 一般认为，鱼子酱和冰镇牡蛎是顶级美味。

sentences.en: Caviar is a delicacy, but few children fancy it.
sentences.cn: 鱼子酱是一种精美的食品, 但只有很少孩子喜欢它.

sentences.en: Caviar is a luxury delicacy, consisting of processed, salted, non - fertilized sturgeon roe.
sentences.cn: 鱼子酱是一种珍羞美味, 是用盐腌过的未受精的鲟鱼卵加工制成.

sentences.en: Decorate with some salmon roe and caviar roe, then serve.
sentences.cn: 最后放上一些三文鱼子和黑鱼子酱作为装饰.

sentences.en: He doesn't like caviar and neither do I.
sentences.cn: 他不喜欢鱼子酱,我也不喜欢.

sentences.en: It's beluga, the best caviar in the world.
sentences.cn: 这是白海豚, 全世界最好的鱼子酱.

sentences.en: Lloyd had urged her to eat caviar. She had shuddered at the thought.
sentences.cn: 劳埃德鼓动她吃鱼子酱。可她一想到这个就打哆嗦。

sentences.en: Popcorn and cokes beneath the stars became champagne and caviar.
sentences.cn: 可口可乐和爆米花赛过香槟和鱼子酱.

sentences.en: She crammed her mouth with caviar.
The play was caviar to the general.

phrases.tran_cn: 无知者不懂得赏识的好东西；曲高和寡之物；阳春白雪

trans.tran_cn: 鱼子酱，〈俚〉被检查员涂掉的句子
trans.tran_en: the preserved eggs of various large fish, eaten as a special very expensive food
